valarray.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VALARAY_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VALARAY_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // valarray.hpp: serialization for stl vector templates
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2005 Matthias Troyer .

00019 #include <valarray>
00020 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/serialization/split_free.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/serialization/array.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/serialization/collection_size_type.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/serialization/detail/get_data.hpp>
00025 
00026 // function specializations must be defined in the appropriate
00027 // namespace - boost::serialization
00028 #if defined(__SGI_STL_PORT) || defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)
00029 #define STD _STLP_STD
00030 #else
00031 #define STD std
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 namespace boost { namespace serialization {
00035 
00037 // valarray<T>
00038 
00039 template<class Archive, class U>
00040 void save( Archive & ar, const STD::valarray<U> &t, const unsigned int /*file_version*/ )
00041 {
00042   const collection_size_type count(t.size());
00043   ar << BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(count);
00044   if (t.size())
00045     ar << make_array(detail::get_data(t), t.size());
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 template<class Archive, class U>
00050 void load( Archive & ar, STD::valarray<U> &t,  const unsigned int /*file_version*/ )
00051 {
00052   collection_size_type count;
00053   ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(count);
00054   t.resize(count);
00055   if (t.size())
00056     ar >> make_array(detail::get_data(t), t.size());
00057 }
00058 
00059 // split non-intrusive serialization function member into separate
00060 // non intrusive save/load member functions
00061 template<class Archive, class U>
00062 inline void serialize( Archive & ar, STD::valarray<U> & t, const unsigned int file_version)
00063 {
00064     boost::serialization::split_free(ar, t, file_version);
00065 }
00066 
00067 } } // end namespace boost::serialization
00068 
00069 #include <boost/serialization/collection_traits.hpp>
00070 
00071 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS(STD::valarray)
00072 #undef STD
00073 
00074 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_VALARAY_HPP
